description: The resource schema to create a CodeArtifact domain.

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 127 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 255 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

DomainName.markdownDescription:
The name of the domain.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 2  

Maximum Length: 50  

Pattern: ^([a-z][a-z0-9\-]{0,48}[a-z0-9])$  

Update requires: No interruption

Name.description: The name of the domain. This field is used for GetAtt
Name.markdownDescription:
The name of the domain. This field is used for GetAtt

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 2  

Maximum Length: 50  

Pattern: ^([a-z][a-z0-9\-]{0,48}[a-z0-9])$  

Update requires: No interruption

Owner.description: The 12-digit account ID of the AWS account that owns the domain. This field is used for GetAtt
Owner.markdownDescription:
The 12-digit account ID of the AWS account that owns the domain. This field is used for GetAtt

---

Required: No

Type: string    

Pattern: [0-9]{12}  

Update requires: No interruption

EncryptionKey.description: The ARN of an AWS Key Management Service (AWS KMS) key associated with a domain.
EncryptionKey.markdownDescription:
The ARN of an AWS Key Management Service (AWS KMS) key associated with a domain.

---

Required: No

Type: string     

Update requires: No interruption

PermissionsPolicyDocument.description: The access control resource policy on the provided domain.
PermissionsPolicyDocument.markdownDescription:
The access control resource policy on the provided domain.

---

Required: No

Type: object  
Minimum Length: 2  

Maximum Length: 5120   

Update requires: No interruption

Tags.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.
Tags.markdownDescription:
An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

---

Required: No

Type: array     

Update requires: No interruption

Arn.markdownDescription:
The ARN of the domain.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 2048   

Update requires: No interruption
